attributes.action: ensure that speed measuring devices used by the police to produce evidence for court be specifically tested and Home Office approved, to the satisfaction of the Secretary of State, for use on motorcycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear from recent responses from the Home Office that the issue of testing and type approving of speed measuring devices that fairly register the presence of motorcycles is being fudged. It is vital that speed enforcement is not only fair but seen to fair thus the testing of these devices for use on motorcycles is essential if speed enforcement is to remain credible to the motorcycle community.
